1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: Bayou Billionaires centers on a Shreveport family who strikes it rich when they discover that their home rests on the fourth largest deposit of natural gas in the U.S. In the new season, Gerald and Kitten Dowden are taking their newfound fortunes by dreaming bigger with more elaborate escapades, from prepping for an apocalypse to producing a zombie/Kung Fu movie and making the biggest mailbox in Louisiana and a modeling stint. The new episodes also sees the Dowdens taking a trip to Hawaii for a second honeymoon and a bachelorette party.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Dalton's senior prom is around the corner, but he has no interest in going. Kitten and Gerald decide to throw a prom in his honor while Grandpa sets out to find his own prom date.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: The Dowden family is prepping for storm season, and Gerald Sr. is going to use their "mailbox money" to make sure he's ready for anything.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Chantel and Albert's trip to beauty school leads to a new career in "Extreme Dog Grooming." After a friendly wager, Gerald and Thomas are determined to build Louisiana's largest mailbox on their property--and their wives are determined to stop them!

5.title: Bayou Boogie
5.plot: Nikki and Valerie have entered the Dowdens into the "Bayou Boogie Battle," a local family dance competition--but the Dowdens don't dance! Kitten comes to the rescue and hires the Dallas Cowboy Cheerleaders as the family's new dance coaches.

6.title: Dude! Where's My Donkey?
6.plot: Gerald brings home a donkey named Jack to mate with Kitten's prized horses, so he can breed his very own spotted mule. The Dowden women strap on their skates and enter the world of competitive Roller Derby as the Well-En-Dowdens!

7.title: The Big Not-So-Easy
7.plot: The Dowdens travel to New Orleans so that Kitten can see about buying a Bed and Breakfast--and the Dowden men are not pleased! Gerald Sr. and the boys scheme in order to make Kitten give up on the big purchase.

8.title: Lights! Camera! Dowden!
8.plot: The Dowden Family begins production on SHREVEPORT SAMARAI--a Kung Fu Zombie epic screen written by Thomas. But production goes awry when Gerald names himself director and takes control.

10.title: Shreveport Smackdown
10.plot: Jessica is ready to move off the Dowden Compound and live on her own but Val and Kitten aren't quite sure she's ready. So, Momma and Grandma test Jessica with household chores to see if she's ready to take care of herself.

11.title: I Do! I Do Again
11.plot: Kitten and Gerald Sr. decide to renew their vows with a big beautiful wedding on the Dowden Compound. The kids all agree to pitch in and help out but their plans all backfire.

12.title: Hula Hula Honeymoon
12.plot: In this 1 hour season finale, Gerald Sr. and Kitten bring the whole family down to Hawaii for their honeymoon but everyone has a different interpretation of rest and relaxation.

1.title: We Put the Country in the Club
1.plot: Matriarch, Kitten Dowden schedules a day for the whole family to check out the local country club in the hopes that they can gain membership to the upper crust of Shreveport. Will the Dowdens ultimately be the right fit for the swanky hangout?

2.title: Mind Your Own Business
2.plot: Gerald Senior is hit-up for investment money by Thomas and Albert. Thomas, wants to open his own Tae Kwan Do school, and receives a investment money from his deep-pocketed papa.

3.title: Animal Magnetism
3.plot: Kitten is determined to find a one-of-a-kind pet for Valerie's daughter Nikki after the tragic death of her cat "Booey," so she tries to purchase a tiger at the local exotic cat sanctuary.

4.title: Sitting on Pins and Tattoo Needles
4.plot: Valerie's daughters seem determined to run their mother into the ground! Jessica tricks her grandfather into paying for a tattoo, and when Valerie and Gerald Sr. find out, they make sure the punishment fits the crime.

5.title: The Big Picture
5.plot: Kitten has commissioned a family portrait and everyone cashes in to look picture perfect. Albert gets some fancy new teeth with a few blingy surprises. Valerie takes a pair of breast implants for a test drive.

6.title: Love Is in the Muggy Air
6.plot: The Dowden men step up their game with the ladies! Gerald Sr. must come up with the perfect way to celebrate the anniversary of his first date with Kitten.

7.title: Clip Show
7.plot: Go back to the best of the best, the creme de la creme, the top moments of this season of Bayou Billionaires.

8.title: Southern Fried Fitness
8.plot: During a routine physical exam, Gerald Senior's doctor informs him that he desperately needs to lose 20 pounds.

9.title: Gerald Has an Art Attack
9.plot: The Dowdens invest in some new art and inspire Albert to begin making some art of his own. Gerald is immediately taken by Albert's "work" and wants to become his first patron.

10.title: Albert and the Aliens
10.plot: Albert believes aliens are out there and coming for him! In an effort to make alien contact, Albert devises a plan that involves an old travel trailer, giant speakers and his guitar!

11.title: The Getaways
11.plot: Gerald Sr. won't let the Dowden ladies take part in the family camping trip! An angry Kitten strikes back and treats the females of the family to a weekend in Beverly Hills.

imdb.plot outline: The Dowdens are a typical, hardworking and close-knit family of modest means living in Shreveport, La. After discovering their home sits on the fourth largest deposit of natural gas in the U.S., the Dowdens struck it rich and are now ready to experience the finer things that life has to offer. Led by patriarch, Gerald, and matriarch, Kitten, the 30-minute, 10-episode series follows the family as they experience the perks of belonging to a new tax bracket - from joining country clubs and hiring personal trainers, to traveling to places they never imagined they'd go.
